snippet: The police determined that a training device from a security exercise had been left behind at the stadium.
abstract: English authorities evacuate 50,000 soccer fans from stadium before Premier League match over suspicious object, which turned out to be phony bomb mistakenly left behind after training exercise; stadium security is increasing focus across Europe in wake of 2015 Paris attacks and new terrorist threats from Northern Ireland.

byline.contributor: Sam Borden contributed reporting from Rueil-Malmaison, France.

lead_paragraph: The police determined that a training device from a security exercise had been left behind at the stadium.

headline.main: Manchester United Match Canceled After Fake Bomb Is Found
headline.print_headline: English Soccer Match Is Canceled Over Imitation Bomb
